# People-Centric Language

The people-centric approach involves creating content that is tailored specifically to the needs of your target group. The people-centric approach is a renewed focus on creating content for your audience's unique perspective. Itâ€™s all about understanding the target group perspective and tailoring your content to that perspective at all levels. This ranges from information architecture and output format to tone of voice and the words that you choose at sentence level. (From: SAP Style Guide).
